div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_fullwidth_slider_0 ds-slider-left et_hover_enabled et_pb_slider et_slider_auto et_slider_speed_7000

div.h2: Harris County. Where Growth and Nature Thrive.

div.p: We welcome you to visit Harris County’s many recreational opportunities such as Callaway Gardens, F.D. Roosevelt State Park, and Lake Harding. The rural charm of our community, with its strategic location and low tax rate will entice you to stay.
We have resources to help you.

div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_2 et_pb_specialty_fullwidth et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_with_background et_section_specialty

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_blog_item_0_0 post-14767 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-welcome et-has-post-format-content et_post_format-et-post-format-standard

div.p:
Welcome to the website for Harris County, Georgia Government. The goal of the site is to keep citizens informed of the actions of our county government.
County Manager Randall Dowling, will maintain a document on the site, “Program of Work,” which will be updated bi-weekly with the status of various programs.
Click here to subscribe to updates via email.

img.alt: Tax Assessor’s QPublic Map Gets Updated

h2.a: Tax Assessor’s QPublic Map Gets Updated

div.p: An aerial flight of the entire county has been completed, converted into a base map, and uploaded to the QPublic web site on the Tax Assessor’s web page at http://qpublic.net/ga/harris/. This new 2020 base map replaces the old 2014 map and shows new homes, roads, and...
